sentences.en: And Marx adds: " In the Greek gens, the savage ( e . g . Iroquois ) shows through unmistakably. "
sentences.cn: 马克思补充说: “ 但是,透过希腊氏族, 也可以清楚地看到蒙昧人 ( 例如易洛魁人 ). ”

sentences.en: Come forth miserableand wash the Iroquois paint from your face and stand before the Hurons.
sentences.cn: 出来,不要脸的布利尔骚恩,洗掉你脸上易洛魁人的花纹,站到休伦人面前.

sentences.en: Her exotic good looks may derive from her mixed ancestry which is Czech, French-Canadian, Iroquois and English.
sentences.cn: 她异常美丽的容貌可能来自她的混合血统，其中包括：捷克人、法裔加拿大人、伊洛魁人和英国人的血统。

sentences.en: Iroquois county is surrounded by Kankakee, Ford, Vermilion counties.
sentences.cn: 文章是由坎卡基, 福特, 弗米利恩县包围.
得到和平与易洛魁族人.

sentences.en: Native American Iroquois Indians developed similar ideas about dreams.
sentences.cn: 美洲土著易洛魁印第安人就发展了有关释梦的类似思想.

sentences.en: Now I can speak boldly Iroquois, and with an easy conscience.
sentences.cn: 现在我可以于心无愧和理直气壮地和易洛魁人谈判了.

sentences.en: Once before, Hutter had been in the hands of the Iroquois, and a few skins had readily effected his release.
sentences.cn: 有一次，哈特落到易洛魁人手中，结果只花了几张兽皮就轻而易举地把他赎了回来。

sentences.en: Set up your own iron production on the Iroquois'island.
sentences.cn: 设定您自己的铁生产在易洛魁族人的海岛.

trans.tran_cn: [地名] [加拿大、美国] 易洛魁
trans.tran_en: a member of any of a group of North American Indian peoples formerly living between the Hudson River and the St Lawrence and Lake Erie
